conclusion: No violation of Art. 3 (substantive aspect);No violation of Art. 5-4;Remainder inadmissible
issue: Articles 70 (1) and 74 of the Criminal Code ; Articles 449-450 of the Code of Criminal Procedure 2006 ; Article 127B of the 1999 version of the Law on the Execution of Punishments 1969
judges: Ganna Yudkivska;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Pavlina Panova;Peer Lorenzen;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
